sourcesContent:
<template>
  <!-- 展示我的所有博客列表-->
  <el-menu mode="vertical">
    <el-menu-item v-for="blog of blogList" :key="blog" index={{blog.title}} @select="chooseBlog">
      {{blog.title}}
    </el-menu-item>
  </el-menu>
</template>

<script>
import {mapState} from 'pinia'
import {useMyBlogsStore} from "@/stores/myBlogs";

export default {
  name: "showMyBlogs",
  data(){
    return{
    }
  },
  computed:{
    ...mapState(useMyBlogsStore,['blogList']),
  },
  methods:{
    chooseBlog(index){
      console.log(index);
    }
  }


}
</script>

<style scoped>

</style>
